text: Mba guma rum ŋgɨr zav, ana mbaram won phɨkthɨgi ŋaara gumgir kamgim, mbe ana han zim, K400.00 mbe heevram mbe nɨɨŋgi. Ana mba ŋkɨɨan mbe ndɨɨv khaŋ mbe nzuai, ‘Nde kha ŋkɨɨa ndigi ŋgɨp, ntan shɨgar muuŋv kɨrim, gu taagi zɨrga.’ 19.13 Mba guman rum won ŋaara gumgi ga nɨɨŋgi ŋkɨɨa, nta mbe kɨni phuni khegenen ŋgarigi ŋaara guma ga vhezi vheza tuktɨgi ŋkɨɨa ma.
